altername_name: Nintendogs + Cats: Shiba Inu & New Friends
name: Nintendogs + Cats: Golden Retriever & New Friends
overview: Nintendogs + cats, a game that lets players interact with realistic puppies - and kittens - in a variety of fun ways. There are three versions of the software, each with different starting breeds: French bulldog, toy poodle and golden retriever. But in each version players can unlock and enjoy more than 20 different breeds.
